///: A calculator app that provides basic math computation capabilities.

enum.Value.///: A value for computation that can take either a constant or variable form.

struct.Variable.///: A mathematical variable represented by a `name` that holds a certain `value`.
struct.Variable.name: string

fn.saveVariables.///: Save a set of variables as a dynamic map of variable names to their value.

fn.compute.///: Compute the `result` of the given `x` and `y` values.

fn.exportVariables.///: Export all saved variables, up to an optional `limit`.
